tour.navigation: Welcome to Adentro.ru - argentinean folkloric dances visualization project. You can choose a dance in the top menu.
tour.player: Here are the player. Visualization starts automaticaly when music reach particular time.
tour.music: You can choose another music tracks. It is helpful for better understanding how choreography links to music.
tour.schema: Schema is interactive also. You can rewind a music by clicking on elements.
tour.animation: Visualization will be shown under the schema.
tour.animation_links: Also you can choose another variants of choreography.
